article_title: Paul Krugman On When The Robots Take All Our Jobs

article_metadata.description: Paul Krugman is here actually addressing a slightly different question: have we reached a slow down in technological innovation? But in the answer to this question is the answer to what's going to happen to us once the robots can do everything better than we can, what will happen when [...]
article_metadata.author: Tim Worstall
